TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A type of experimental treatment in which foreign genetic material (DNA or RNA) is inserted into a person's cells to prevent or fight disease. Gene therapy is being studied in the treatment of certain types of cancer.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Tipo de tratamiento experimental mediante el cual se introduce un material genético extraño (ADN) o (ARN) en las células de una persona a fin de prevenir o combatir una enfermedad.
